title: Sound file root
description: The root of the sounds file. Each property of this file is the name of the sound event

replace.title: Replace or append
replace.description: Whether the sounds defined for this event should overwrite sounds in events with the same name in lower resource packs, or add to them

subtitle.title: Subtitle
subtitle.description: Will be translated as a subtitle if 'show subtitles is enabled'

sounds.title: Sounds
sounds.description: The sounds which can be chosen when this sound event occurs. Only one will be chosen

oneOf.title: A sound file
oneOf.description: The path to a sound file in the sounds folder. To be file system agnostic, it uses forward slashes

name.title: A sound file
name.description: The path to a sound file in the sounds folder. To be file system agnostic, it uses forward slashes

volume.title: Volume
volume.description: The volume this will be played at. Defaults to 1.0

pitch.title: Controls the pitch
pitch.description: Defaults to 1.0. Other values can be used. Higher means higher pitched

weight.title: Chance
weight.description: A higher weight means an increased chance of choosing this sound

stream.title: Stream from file
stream.description: Whether this sound should be streamed from its file. If true, the sound will be streamed. This lowers RAM usage but can be slower to play. Recommended for sounds longer than a few seconds

type.description: If it is event, allows referencing of another sound event
